@ninaturner Reparations is #FullRepair to #5InjuryAreas by using #5FormsOfReparations.
Reparations is more than Compensation for unpaid labor, closing a Racial Wealth Gap and  cash for punitive damages. 
We need #ReparationsNow ASAP
https://t.co/nHiKvyiY0U https://t.co/GhaZkJYiTD
@ninaturner https://t.co/nHiKvyiY0U

#WithTheseHands we’ll send a bold message to Congress. The people of #OH11 want us to:

🙌🏽 Pass a People’s Stimulus
🙌🏿 Dismantle our racist CJ system
🙌🏾 Pass #MedicareForAll
🙌🏿 Cancel student debt
🙌🏼 Hold corporations accountable
🙌🏾 Legalize marijuana
🙌🏾 Pass a Green New Deal
@ninaturner GUARANTEED health care, GUARANTEED income, GUARANTEED college-- if its not guaranteed, then people will "fall through the cracks" bc care will act like panning.
@Sycamoron @ninaturner @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @RoKhanna You don’t know the #Squad will do the right thing.   No Cart before horse

@davidsirias1 @ninaturner @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @RoKhanna I will wait until vote.  That is why I said it before the vote.  If they vote against pelosi, I will continue to support them.  If they vote with pelosi, I will know they are against my interests.
@ninaturner I will be watching tomorrow for a number of reps who will vote for Pelosi.  I will be transferring what I normally donate to them to you.  @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @RoKhanna
@ninaturner I agree

@ozprattboxing @ninaturner @JamaalBowmanNY I think if we had to list all the things the US needs to do to join the list of open, democratic nations, you'd need more room than twitter provides. Let's aim for the top 10 spot in the OECD, from our current 38th ranking...   https://t.co/yLvR8lJMKo
@Detrieman @ninaturner @JamaalBowmanNY Poverty seeks Equality , while Equality stimulates economy. Once you fix poverty , the remaining will flow. Therefore reparations make complete since.
@ninaturner @JamaalBowmanNY said the word that everyone seems scared to say “Reparations” , @ninaturner are you scared to put that on your priority list ?
@ninaturner I wish I could vote for you.
@LBcrats @ninaturner @krystalball @davidsirota @briebriejoy @BernieSanders How much will all she is advocating cost? Hardly thoughtful.

A lot is at stake here. \n\n#WithTheseHands we will hold @NinaTurner’s feet to the fire. That’s what any responsible constituency would do.
